uid.description: The unique identifier of the newspaper.

startYear.description: The year of the first available article in the newspaper.

endYear.description: The year of the last available article in the newspaper.

languageCodes.description: ISO 639-1 codes of languages used in the newspaper.

totalArticles.description: Total number of articles in the newspaper.

totalIssues.description: Total number of issues in the newspaper.

totalPages.description: Total number of pages in the newspaper.
